In 2016, Azerbaijan has been developed with confidence and stability, solidarity and solidarity based on the will of the people.
Important steps have been taken in the year 2016 on economic development in Azerbaijan and fall into history as a year of deeper economic reforms.
Azerbaijan's non-oil industry increased by 5% in Azerbaijan by 2016, agriculture by 2.6%, invested $ 11.7 billion into country's economy
In 2016, social issues have been successfully solved, all projects have been fully implemented, salaries increased by 7%, pensions increased by 8%.
In 2016, Azerbaijan's international relations have expanded. Azerbaijan is known as a reliable and worthy partner in the world.

The interests of the main state, the people for the Azerbaijani government. No external force can dictate to Azerbaijan its will.

2017 has been proclaimed as the Year of Islamic Solidarity in Azerbaijan.
